sentence.Network_en: He's a schemer, and now his plot struck back.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个阴谋家, 而现在他搞的阴谋却反过来害了他自己.

sentence.Network_en: According to Homer, Maia bore Mercury at the peep of day - a schemer subtle beyond all belier.
sentence.Network_cn: 荷马说, 迈亚在黎明时分生下墨丘利,他是个计谋过人的智多星.

sentence.Network_en: He who plots evil will be known as a schemer.

entry.tran: 搞阴谋的人;施诡计的人
entry.def: If you refer to someone as a schemer, you mean that they make secret plans in order to get some benefit for themselves.

example.ex: ...office schemers who think of nothing but their own advancement.
example.tran: 只想着自己晋升的阴险狡诈的办公室职员

means.word_mean: 1. a planner who draws up a personal scheme of action
